title: Enhanced H2 production through biomass pyrolysis by applying alkaline ceramic lithium cuprate (Li2CuO2) as a bifunctional material
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00333K, Paper
Fernando Plascencia-Hernández, Ana Yañez-Aulestia, Carlos Hernández-Fontes, Heriberto Pfeiffer
This work shows that Li2CuO2 can be used as a bifunctional material during glucose pyrolysis, which highly enhances H2 production and H2/COx ratios. The reaction path involving different catalytic and sorption processes is also presented.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
